# Source Function

### 1. Brief Description
The `source()` function is used in R in order to read and evaluate scripture in the R language. The script can be either a pre-existing script or a script written in R. The source function enables the user to execute scripts written in R within the existing R environment, allowing them to use existing features and variables.

### 2. What Package Contains It
 `source()` is part of the base R language, not a package.
